00032 
00033 // we declare all of the MultiTouch stuff in Win7 here to prevent requiring users to use the Win7 headers
00034 #if ! defined( WM_TOUCH )
00035 DECLARE_HANDLE(HTOUCHINPUT);
00036 typedef struct tagTOUCHINPUT {
00037     LONG x;
00038     LONG y;
00039     HANDLE hSource;
00040     DWORD dwID;
00041     DWORD dwFlags;
00042     DWORD dwMask;
00043     DWORD dwTime;
00044     ULONG_PTR dwExtraInfo;
00045     DWORD cxContact;
00046     DWORD cyContact;
00047 } TOUCHINPUT, *PTOUCHINPUT;
00048 typedef TOUCHINPUT const * PCTOUCHINPUT;
00049 #define TOUCH_COORD_TO_PIXEL(l)         ((l) / 100)
00050 #define WM_TOUCH                        0x0240
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 namespace cinder { namespace app {
00054 
00055 class AppImplMsw {
00056  public:
00057     AppImplMsw( class App *aApp );
00058     virtual ~AppImplMsw();
00059     
00060     Vec2i           getWindowPos() const { return mWindowOffset; }
00061     int             getWindowWidth() const { return mWindowWidth; }
00062     int             getWindowHeight() const { return mWindowHeight; }
00063     virtual void    setWindowWidth( int aWindowWidth ) { }
00064     virtual void    setWindowHeight( int aWindowHeight ) { }
00065     virtual void    setWindowSize( int aWindowWidth, int aWindowHeight ) {}
00066     float           getFrameRate() const { return mFrameRate; }
00067     virtual float   setFrameRate( float aFrameRate ) { return -1.0f; }
00068     bool            isFullScreen() const { return mFullScreen; }
00069     virtual void    toggleFullScreen() {}
00070     bool            isBorderless() const { return mBorderless; }
00071     bool            isAlwaysOnTop() const { return mAlwaysOnTop; }
00072     virtual Vec2i   mouseLocation();
00073     virtual void    quit() = 0;
00074     
00075     virtual void    privateSetWindowOffset__( const Vec2i &aWindowOffset ) { mWindowOffset = aWindowOffset; }
00076     
00077     
00078     static void hideCursor();
00079     static void showCursor();
00080     
00081     static Buffer   loadResource( int id, const std::string &type );
00082     
00083     static fs::path     getAppPath();   
00084     static fs::path     getOpenFilePath( const fs::path &initialPath, std::vector<std::string> extensions );
00085     static fs::path     getSaveFilePath( const fs::path &initialPath, std::vector<std::string> extensions );
00086     static fs::path     getFolderPath( const fs::path &initialPath );
00087     
00088  protected:
00089     class App   *mApp;
00090     int         mWindowWidth, mWindowHeight;    
00091     bool        mFullScreen, mBorderless, mAlwaysOnTop;
00092     Vec2i       mWindowOffset;
00093     float       mFrameRate;
00094     ULONG_PTR   mGdiplusToken;
00095 };
00096 
00097 } } // namespace cinder::app
